metadata.title: CVE-2021-40570 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The binary MP4Box in Gpac 1.0.1 has a double-free vulnerability in theavc_compute_poc function in av_parsers.c, which allows attackers to cause adenial of service, even code execution and escalation of privileges.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
